text: References in any District of Columbia law, rule, regulation, or the delegation of authority to the General Manager of the Washington Convention Center Authority, other than in § 10-1202.07(a-1), or the Chief Executive Officer and General Manager of the Washington Convention and Sports Authority shall be deemed to refer to the President and Chief Executive Officer of the Washington Convention and Sports Authority.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-356, see notes under § 10-306.

DC CODE § 10-1202.07a

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Parks, Public Buildings, Grounds, and Space. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: References deemed to refer to the President and Chief Executive Officer of the Washington Convention and Sports Authority.
